content.text:
# List of political office-holders of the Republic of China by age

In this list of political office-holders of the Republic of China (post-1947 Constitution) by age, for each office, the table charts the age of each officeholder at the time of taking office (the first time taking office if elected or appointed to multiple and consecutive terms), upon leaving office, and at the time of death.
President of the Republic of China
{| class="sortable wikitable"
! rowspan=2 | #
! rowspan=2 | President
! rowspan=2 | Born
! rowspan=2 | Age at
! rowspan=2 | Age at
! rowspan=2 | timespan
! colspan=2 | Lifespan
|-
! Died !! Age
|- style="text-align: left; background:#FFFFFF"
| 1
| data-sort-value="Chiang Kai-shek" | Chiang Kai-shek
|
|
|
| (died in office)
|
|

Graphical representation
This is a graphical lifespan timeline of the presidents of the Republic of China (post-1947 Constitution) and they are listed in order of office.
ImageSize  = width:$width height:$height
PlotArea   = right:10 left:1 bottom:80 top:60
Period     = from:$start till:$end
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
Legend = orientation:vertical position:bottom columns:1
Colors =
id:bg              value:white
id:lightline       value:rgb(0.9, 0.9, 0.9)
id:lighttext       value:rgb(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
id:LIFESPAN        value:rgb(0.88, 0.90, 0.70) Legend: Lifespan
id:PRES_IND        value:rgb(0.7, 0.7, 0.7) Legend: Independent
id:PRES_KMT        value:rgb(0, 0, 0.6) Legend: Kuomintang
id:PRES_DPP        value:rgb(0.1, 0.58, 0.19) Legend: Democratic_Progressive
id:NAME            value:rgb(0.15, 0.13, 0.05)
id:TODAY           value:lightpurple
BackgroundColors = canvas:bg
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:lightline unit:year increment:1 start:$start
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:lighttext unit:year increment:10 start:1890
Define $dy = -5 # shift text to button side of bar
LineData=
at:$now color:TODAY width:0.1
PlotData=
bar:1 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1887 till:1948 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chiang Kai-shek
color:PRES_KMT
from:1948 till:1949
color:LIFESPAN
from:1949 till:1950
color:PRES_KMT
from:1950 till:1975
bar:2 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:left fontsize:M
from:1905 till:1975 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Yen Chia-kan
color:PRES_KMT
from:1975 till:1978
color:LIFESPAN
from:1978 till:1993
bar:3 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1910 till:1978 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chiang Ching-kuo
color:PRES_KMT
from:1978 till:1988
bar:4 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1923 till:1988 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Lee Teng-hui
color:PRES_KMT
from:1988 till:2000
color:LIFESPAN
from:2000 till:2020
bar:5 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2000 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chen Shui-bian
color:PRES_DPP
from:2000 till:2008
color:LIFESPAN
from:2008 till:$now
bar:6 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2008 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Ma Ying-jeou
color:PRES_KMT
from:2008 till:2016
color:LIFESPAN
from:2016 till:$now
bar:7 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1956 till:2016 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Tsai Ing-wen
color:PRES_DPP
from:2016 till:$now
bar:8 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1959 till:2024 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Lai Ching-te
color:PRES_DPP
from:2024 till:$now
TextData =
fontsize:M
textcolor:red
pos:($warning,30)
text:Updated /
TextData =
pos:(280,$height)
fontsize:L
textcolor:black
text:"Lifespan of each ROC President (post-1947 Constitution)"
}}
The following chart shows presidents by their age (living presidents in green), with the years of their presidency in blue.
bar:Ma color:alive from:0 till:57.85
bar:Ma color:pres from:57.85 till:  65.85
bar:Ma color:alive from:65.85 till:
bar:Tsai color:alive from:0 till:59.72
bar:Tsai color:pres from:59.72 till:  67.72
bar:Tsai color:alive from:67.72 till:
bar:Lai color:alive from:0 till:64.62
bar:Lai color:pres from:64.62 till:
}}

Premier (President of the Executive Yuan)
As of  , fifteen former premiers of the Republic of China are still alive. The most recent death of a former premier was that of Hau Pei-tsun (who was prime minister during 1990–1993) on 30 March 2020.

President of the Legislative Yuan
As of  , three former presidents of the Legislative Yuan are still alive. The most recent death of a former premier was that of Liu Sung-pan (who was president of the Yuan during 1992–1999) on 18 November 2016.

President of the Examination Yuan
As of  , three former presidents of the Yuan are still alive. The most recent death of a former Examination Yuan president was that of Hsu Shui-teh (who was President of the Yuan during 1996–2002) on 31 March 2021.
